thread.title: Police Scotland start anti-alcohol abuse patrols | Border
thread.title_full: Police Scotland start anti-alcohol abuse patrols | Border - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Police Scotland start anti-alcohol abuse patrols | Border
text:
PC Iain Leggett, Police Scotland Credit: ITV Border Police Scotland are tackling alcohol abuse and anti-social behaviour throughout Annandale and Eskdale.
High visibility patrols and unmarked patrols are taking place in hotspots around the Annan area, with young people warned any alcohol found will be confiscated:
Officers involved in Operation Resolve have been very successful over the last week in charging a female youth with racially aggravated assault. We have also managed to charge a number of other local youths with anti-social behaviour and disorder offences.
â€“ PC Iain Leggett, Police Scotland Last updated Thu 22 Oct 2015 Politics Dumfries and Galloway
